name: exemplary
content:
Add to word list

very good and suitable to be copied by other people: His tact was exemplary, especially considering the circumstances. We expect exemplary conduct of our faculty, staff, and students.
[ before noun ] An exemplary punishment is severe and intended as a warning to others: exemplary damages The judge awarded exemplary damages. Prosecutors demanded an exemplary punishment.
